    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2416</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Interactive anatomy of the human body</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Anatomie des menschlichen Körpers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anatomie interactive du corps humain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anatomy interativo do corpo humano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anatomia interattiva del corpo umano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική ανατομία του ανθρώπινου σώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anatomía interactiva del cuerpo humano</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of interactive animation of the systems of various body systems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">body systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung der interaktiven Animation der 
Systeme von verschiedenen Körpersystemen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'animation interactive des 
systèmes de divers systèmes de corps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção do animation interativo dos 
sistemas de vários sistemas do corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di animazione interattiva dei 
sistemi di vari sistemi del corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή της διαλογικής ζωτικότητας των συστημάτων 
των διάφορων συστημάτων σωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de la animación interactiva de 
los sistemas de los varios sistemas del cuerpo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körpersysteme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systèmes de corps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistemas do corpo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistemi del corpo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συστήματα σωμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistemas del cuerpo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
